label: GeographicalFeature
comment: Representation of real world phenomenon associated with a location relative to the Earth, such as cities, buildings, roads, rivers, forests and lakes.

datatypeProperties.comment: The indication of whether or not this specified geographical feature is a collection of features.
The identifier of the coordinate reference system for this geographical feature.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.

objectProperties.comment: A circle included in this specified geographical feature.
The geographical grid included in this geographical feature.
The geographical line included in this geographical feature.
The geographical multi-curve included in this geographical feature.
The geographical multi-point included in this geographical feature.
The geographical multi-surface included in this geographical feature.
The geographical point included in this geographical feature.
The geographical surface included in this geographical feature.
A polygon included in this geographical multi-surface.
The CS (Coordinate System) engineering coordinate reference system used for this geographical coordinate.
The geographical coordinate source system used for this geographical coordinate.

referencedBy.comment: A geographical feature associated with this communication event.
A geographical feature associated with this communication event.
